# Mint Tokens

:::warning

Candy Machine v1 has been deprecated. Creating a new instance of Candy Machine v1 is no longer possible. Please use [Sugar: Candy Machine CLI](/developer-tools/sugar) instead.

::

:::info

For now, only the owner of the CMv1 can mint tokens

::

## Preparation

  1. Check that you have mainnet-beta-temp`(if using mainnet-beta; it will say devnet or otherwise on different networks) file in your `.cache folder

  2. Check that you have more than 1 SOL in your mainnet-beta wallet

## Mint one token ` ts-node ~/metaplex-foundation/metaplex/js/packages/cli/src/candy-machine-v1-cli.ts mint_one_token -k ~/.config/solana/wallet.json --env mainnet-beta `

## Mint multiple tokens - –number number of tokens ``` //For mainnet ts-node ~/metaplex-foundation/metaplex/js/packages/cli/src/candy-machine-v1-cli.ts mint_multiple_tokens -k ~/.config/solana/wallet.json –env mainnet-beta –number 2 //For devnet ts-node ~/metaplex-foundation/metaplex/js/packages/cli/src/candy-machine-v1-cli.ts mint_multiple_tokens -k ~/.config/solana/wallet.json –env devnet –number 2

```

twit
